MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in David Gray Drive and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:45pm due to an urgent cable repair being required and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:28pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
